description.en:
Is blacking out always this scary?

Imagine blacking out and waking up in a different world! A teacher finds herself in the body of Lady Lucia, a woman who committed suicide. While trying to understand what happened, she realizes Lucia was actually murdered. Why does the emperor hide behind a mask? And what really happened to Lucia…?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1191), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57063419)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [COPIN](https://copincomics.com/toon/341), [Manto](https://manta.net/series/1401)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30747)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82359)
description.id:
Apakah pingsan selalu seseram ini? Bayangkan pingsan dan bangun di dunia yang berbeda! Seorang guru menemukan dirinya dalam tubuh Lady Lucia, seorang wanita yang bunuh diri. Saat mencoba memahami apa yang terjadi, dia menyadari bahwa Lucia sebenarnya dibunuh. Mengapa kaisar bersembunyi di balik topeng? Dan apa yang sebenarnya terjadi pada Lucia…?

---
Saya tidak tahu Blackout sangat menakutkan. Setelah minum alkohol, filmnya dipotong, dan ketika saya membuka mata, saya pikir saya bisa selesai pindah ke dimensi! Suatu hari, dia tiba-tiba ja tuh ke dunia yang sama sekali berbeda dan menjadi 'Lucia'. Bahkan sebelum memahami situasi yang memalukan, dia menyadari bahwa penyebab pemilik tubuh itu adalah pembunuhan daripada bunuh diri. Aku terus mengganggunya."Apa baskom besar itu?" ".. . "Sial, aku melakukannya Sekarang, aku bahkan mengganggu orang lain yang mencampur nasi dengan sendok! Kaisar misterius dan petugas mencurigakan yang tidak mengungkapkan penampilan mereka. Kisah pria di balik topeng dan Lucia, seorang idiot yang serius di dunia, dimulai sekarang.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1191), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57063419)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [COPIN](https://copincomics.com/toon/341), [Manto](https://manta.net/series/1401)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30747)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82359)
description.ko:
블랙아웃이 이렇게 무서운 건 줄 몰랐지.
술 마시고 필름 끊겼다 눈떠 보니, 차원 이동에 빙의까지 끝냈을 줄은!

어느 날 갑자기 전혀 다른 세상에 뚝 떨어져 '루시아'가 되어 버린 그녀.
황당한 상황을 파악도 전에 몸 주인의 사인(死因)이 자살 아닌 살해임을 눈치채고 현실 적응에 진상 추리, 바깥에 얼굴 한번 안 비치는 황제까지 고민하랴 바빠 죽겠구먼 이 와중 수상하기 짝이 없는 존재, 시종장까지 자꾸만 그녀를 귀찮게 하는데......

"그 커다란 대야는 뭡니까?"
"..."

제길, 하다 하다 이제 남이 양푼에 밥 비벼 먹는 것까지 간섭을 하네!

모습을 드러내지 않는 의문의 황제와 수상한 시종장.
가면 뒤에 숨은 그 남자와 세상 진지한 엉뚱녀 루시아의 이야기가 지금 시작됩니다.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1191), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57063419)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [COPIN](https://copincomics.com/toon/341), [Manto](https://manta.net/series/1401)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30747)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82359)
